resources.string:
Hello, this is an application created by students of the Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University on the course of the OPD. It is aimed at improving the environmental situation on the territory of SPbPU and in the future, with the development of the project, on the territory of other universities.
The project contains: a separate waste collection map, a carbon footprint calculator and a news portal for those who like to participate in the ecological life of the Polytechnic University and not only.
a lot of text that we are commands for opd and all that

string-array.name: calc_main_text
string-array.item: How much electricity did you use in the last day/month
If you have traveled in the last month, write down how many kilometers you traveled
Do you make REGULAR trips to work/study? If yes, what is the average distance you drive?
How much money do you spend on clothes per month
How many miles did you fly this month
